rows.label: bf03080100_0010
rows.name: There's some kinda dim light...

rows.label: bf03080100_0020
rows.name:
The Invidan Divine Beast's 
hide on it's back is translucent.

rows.label: bf03080100_0030
rows.name:
The light from outside must be 
reaching all the way here.

rows.label: bf03080100_0040
rows.name: So the Divine Beast must be above the clouds now?

rows.label: bf03080100_0050
rows.name: Probably so.

rows.label: bf03080100_0060
rows.name:
If we can make it to the source of the light,
maybe we'll find a way out of here.

rows.label: bf03080100_0070
rows.name: Wait a moment.

rows.label: bf03080100_0080
rows.name:
Haven't seen faces like 
yours around here.

rows.label: bf03080100_0090
rows.name:
Were you perhaps swallowed by the 
Divine Beast while drifting?

rows.label: bf03080100_0100
rows.name: Hm? That Blade...

rows.label: bf03080100_0110
rows.name: An emerald Core Crystal!

rows.label: bf03080100_0120
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]*gasp*

rows.label: bf03080100_0130
rows.name:
I see, so the rumors 
were true after all.

rows.label: bf03080100_0140
rows.name:
What rumors are 
you talking about?

rows.label: bf03080100_0150
rows.name:
The legendary Blade that every Driver 
has heard of at least once - the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf03080100_0160
rows.name: They say she woke up after 500 years.

rows.label: bf03080100_0170
rows.name:
Still, who'd have thought a kid 
like you would be a Driver.

rows.label: bf03080100_0180
rows.name: What's wrong with me being a Driver?

rows.label: bf03080100_0190
rows.name:
Nah, you might handle 
a normal Blade just fine...

rows.label: bf03080100_0200
rows.name:
but this one's not normal - she's 
way out of your league.

rows.label: bf03080100_0210
rows.name:
Kid, hand over the Holy Grail 
and her sword.

rows.label: bf03080100_0220
rows.name:
Don't tell me 
you're after Homura too.

rows.label: bf03080100_0230
rows.name: Like hell I'll hand her over!

rows.label: bf03080100_0240
rows.name: You've got spirit, kid.

rows.label: bf03080100_0250
rows.name:
Yuu, Zuo, take care of those two. 
I'll handle this brat myself.

rows.label: bf03080100_0260
rows.name: Heheh. Leave it to us, boss.

rows.label: bf03080100_0270
rows.name: We'll take real good care of you, missy.
